goal: Implement core graph traversal functions for querying the knowledge graph
description: Add graph traversal utility functions to a new query module. These functions provide fundamental operations for searching and navigating the knowledge graph: finding nodes by type, searching nodes by name, and retrieving neighboring nodes connected via edges.

contains.name: find_nodes_by_type
contains.description: Find all nodes in the graph matching a specific node type

contains.name: find_node_by_name
contains.description: Search for a node by name, checking id and type-specific name fields

contains.name: get_neighbors
contains.description: Get all nodes connected to the given node, optionally filtered by edge type
